ext.settings.colorCustomizations.descrip: Manage extra matched characters color customizations. Set to `false` to turn it off
ext.settings.html.htmlDoctypeAttributes:
Matches the DOCTYPE attributes:

* <!DOCTYPE `html` `PUBLIC`>

```html

<!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC>


```
Leave it empty to disable for this item only
ext.settings.html.htmlDoctypeExclamation:
Matches the exclamation point preceding the DOCTYPE tag:

* <`!`DOCTYPE html PUBLIC>

```html

<!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC>


```
Leave it empty to disable for this item only
ext.settings.html.htmlDoctypeElement:
Matches the DOCTYPE tag:

* <!`DOCTYPE` html PUBLIC>

```html

<!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC>


```
Leave it empty to disable for this item only
ext.settings.html.htmlEntitiesSemicolon:
Matches the semicolon in HTML entities:

* &amp`;`

* &#174`;`

```html

&
®


```
Leave it empty to disable for this item only
ext.settings.html.htmlGenericAttributesF:
Matches HTML attributes followed by equals and a parameter. It does not matches the HTML and SVG events attributes. [See HTML and SVG Events](#ADD-LINK). * <div `class`="class"></div> * <div `generic-attribute`="parameter"></div> ```html
``` Leave it empty to disable for this item only
ext.settings.html.htmlEventsAttributes:
Matches HTML event attributes. [See HTML and SVG Events](#ADD-LINK). * <div `onpointercancel`="callback()"></div> * <div `onclick`="callback('with-parameters', variable)"></div> ```html
``` Leave it empty to disable for this item only
ext.settings.html.htmlAttributeValueSepa:
Matches HTML attribute-value separator (=). This is a global match. * <div onpointercancel`=`"callback()"></div> * <div class`=`"test"></div> ```html
``` Leave it empty to disable for this item only
ext.settings.html.htmlStyleAttributesLan:
Matches HTML Style Type Attribute language identifier.

* <style type="text/`css`"></style>

* <style type="text/`scss`"></style>

* <style type="text/`sass`"></style>

```html

<style type="text/css"></style>
<style type="text/scss"></style>
<style type="text/sass"></style>
<style type="text/stylus"></style>
<style type="text/less"></style>
<style type="text/postcss"></style>


```
Leave it empty to disable for this item only
ext.settings.html.htmlScriptAttributesLa:
Matches HTML Script Type Attribute language identifier.

* <script type="text/`javascript`"></script>

* <script type="text/`typescript`"></script>

* <script type="application/`dart`"></script>

```html

<script type="text/javascript"></script>
<script type="text/typescript"></script>
<script type="text/coffeescript"></script>
<script type="application/dart"></script>


```
Leave it empty to disable for this item only
ext.settings.html.htmlLinkAttributesMime:
Matches HTML link tag type attribute icon MIME type.

* <link rel="icon" type="image/`x-icon`" />

* <link rel="icon" type="image/`svg+xml`" />

```html

<link rel="icon" type="image/svg+xml" />
<link rel="icon" type="image/x-icon" />


```
Leave it empty to disable for this item only
ext.settings.html.htmlTags:
Matches HTML known elements. * <`div`></`div`> * <`span`></`span`> ```html
``` Leave it empty to disable for this item only
ext.settings.html.htmlCustomTags:
Matches non-standard HTML elements.

* <`circle`></`circle`>

* <`another-custom-element`></`another-custom-element`>

```html

<circle></circle>
<another-custom-element></another-custom-element>


```
Leave it empty to disable for this item only
ext.settings.html.ariaAttributePrefix:
Matches aria-attributes aria prefix. * <div `aria-`label="label"></div> ```html
``` Leave it empty to disable for this item only
ext.settings.html.ariaAttributeSuffix:
Matches aria-attributes suffix. * <div aria-`label`="label"></div> ```html
``` Leave it empty to disable for this item only
ext.settings.html.dataAttributePrefix:
Matches data-attributes data prefix. * <div `data-`color="#000000"></div> ```html
``` Leave it empty to disable for this item only
ext.settings.html.dataAttributeSuffix:
Matches data-attributes suffix. * <div data-`color`="#000000"></div> ```html
``` Leave it empty to disable for this item only
ext.settings.angular.angularExpression:
Matches the curly braces preceding and succeeding an angular expression. For both template string interpolation and temlate expressions. * `{{`condition?.met() ? 'value' : 'otherwise'`}}` * <div class="class `{{`condition?.met() ? 'value' : 'otherwise'`}}`"></div> ```html
{{condition?.met() ? 'value' : 'otherwise'}}
``` Leave it empty to disable for this item only
ext.settings.angular.angularAndAngularMa:
Matches Angular-and-Angular-Material-specific element tags. [See Angular-specific tags](#ADD-LINK)

* <`ng-container`></`ng-container`>

* <`mat-action-list`></`mat-action-list`>

```html

<ng-container></ng-container>
<mat-action-list></mat-action-list>


```
Leave it empty to disable for this item onlyLeave it empty to disable for this item only
ext.settings.angular.angularAnimationTri:
Matches Angular animation trigger attribute prefix. * <div `@`animationTrigger></div> ```html
``` Leave it empty to disable for this item only

Matches Angular animation trigger attribute variable name. * <div @`animationTrigger`></div> ```html
``` Leave it empty to disable for this item only
ext.settings.angular.angularBindingAttri:
Matches Angular binding parenthesis and brackets delimiters. This matches all angular bindings delimiters. * <div `(`click`)`="callback()"></div> * <div `[`input`]`="element"></div> * <div `[(`doubleWay`)]`="binding"></div> ```html
``` Leave it empty to disable for this item only
ext.settings.angular.angularEventHandler:
Matches Angular event name. * <div (`click`)="callback()"></div> ```html
``` Leave it empty to disable for this item only
ext.settings.angular.angularOneWayBindin:
Matches Angular animation trigger decorator inside one-way bindings. * <div [`@`visibility]="getMenuState()"></div> ```html
``` Leave it empty to disable for this item only

Matches Angular fisrt level depth properties in one-way bindings. * <div [`style`.font-size.px]="10"></div> * <div [`property`]="element"></div> ```html
``` Leave it empty to disable for this item only

Matches Angular second level depth properties in one-way bindings. * <div [style.`font-size`.px]="10"></div> ```html
``` Leave it empty to disable for this item only

Matches Angular third level depth properties in one-way bindings. * <div [style.font-size.`px`]="10"></div> ```html
``` Leave it empty to disable for this item only
ext.settings.angular.angularPrefixedAttr:
Matches Angular let- prefixed attributes' prefix. * <div `let-`variable="element"></div> ```html
``` Leave it empty to disable for this item only

Matches Angular ref- prefixed attributes' prefix. * <div `ref-`variable="element"></div> ```html
``` Leave it empty to disable for this item only

Matches Angular ref- and let- prefixed attributes' variable name. * <div ref-`variable`="element"></div> * <div let-`variable`="element"></div> ```html
``` Leave it empty to disable for this item only

Matches Angular ref- and let- prefixed attributes' RxJS suffix. * <div let-variable`$`="element"></div> ```html
``` Leave it empty to disable for this item only
ext.settings.angular.angularSyntaxSugarA:
Matches Angular syntax sugar attribute decorator. * <div `*`ngFor="let obs of observable | async as test"></div> ```html
``` Leave it empty to disable for this item only

Matches Angular syntax sugar attribute name. * <div *`ngFor`="let obs of observable | async as test"></div> ```html
``` Leave it empty to disable for this item only
ext.settings.angular.angularTemplateVari:
Matches Angular template variable decorator. * <div `#`menu="parsedMenu"></div> ```html
``` Leave it empty to disable for this item only

Matches Angular template variable name. * <div #`menu`="parsedMenu"></div> ```html
``` Leave it empty to disable for this item only
ext.settings.primeng.primeNgElementTags:
Matches PrimeNG-specific element tags.

* <`p-calendar`></`p-calendar`>

* <`p-button`></`p-button`>

```html

<p-calendar></p-calendar>
<p-button></p-button>


```
Leave it empty to disable for this item only
ext.settings.ngBootstrap.ngBootstrapElem:
Matches NG Bootstrap-specific element tags.

* <`ngb-alert`></`ngb-alert`>

* <`ngb-carousel`></`ngb-carousel`>

```html

<ngb-alert></ngb-alert>
<ngb-carousel></ngb-carousel>


```
Leave it empty to disable for this item only
ext.settings.kendo.kendoUiElementTags:
Matches Kendo UI-specific element tags.

* <`kendo-window`></`kendo-window`>

* <`kendo-upload`></`kendo-upload`>

```html

<kendo-window></kendo-window>
<kendo-upload></kendo-upload>


```
Leave it empty to disable for this item only
ext.settings.svg.svgTags:
Matches known SVG elements.

* <`circle`></`circle`>

* <`path`></`path`>

```html

<circle></circle>
<svg>
	<circle></circle>
	<path></path>
</svg>


```
Leave it empty to disable for this item only
ext.settings.xml.xmlTagNamespaceDivider:
Matches XML/HTML element namespace colon separator.

* <li`:`title>Book Title</li`:`title>

```html

<li:title>Book Title</li:title>


```
Leave it empty to disable for this item only
ext.settings.xml.xmlTagNamespaceSuffix:
Matches XML/HTML element namespace suffix.

* <li:`title`>Book Title</li:`title`>

```html

<li:title>Book Title</li:title>


```
Leave it empty to disable for this item only
ext.settings.xml.xmlAttributeNamespaceDi:
Matches XML/HTML attribute namespace colon separator.

* <li:book xmlns`:`li="bookURI">[...]</li:book>

```html

<li:book xmlns:li="bookURI">[...]</li:book>


```
Leave it empty to disable for this item only
ext.settings.xml.xmlAttributeNamespaceSu:
Matches XML/HTML attribute namespace suffix.

* <li:book xmlns:`li`="bookURI">[...]</li:book>

```html

<li:book xmlns:li="bookURI">[...]</li:book>


```
Leave it empty to disable for this item only
ext.settings.xml.xmlStylesheetAttributes:
Matches xml-stylesheet Type Attribute language identifier.

* <?xml-stylesheet ref="shakespeare.xsl" type="text/`xsl`"?>

* <?xml-stylesheet ref="shakespeare.css" type="text/`css`"?>

* <?xml-stylesheet ref="shakespeare.xml" type="text/`xml`"?>

```html

<?xml-stylesheet ref="shakespeare.xsl" type="text/xsl"?>
<?xml-stylesheet ref="shakespeare.css" type="text/css"?>
<?xml-stylesheet ref="shakespeare.xml" type="text/xml"?>


```
Leave it empty to disable for this item only
ext.settings.dtd.dtdDoctypeExclamation:
Matches the exclamation point preceding DTD element tags:

* <`!`ELEMENT BANNER (#PCDATA)>

* <`!`ATTLIST TVSCHEDULE NAME CDATA #REQUIRED>

```html

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<!DOCTYPE TVSCHEDULE [
	<!ELEMENT BANNER (#PCDATA)>
	<!ELEMENT DAY (DATE,(HOLIDAY|PROGRAMSLOT+)+)>
	<!ATTLIST TVSCHEDULE NAME CDATA #REQUIRED>
]>


```
Leave it empty to disable for this item only
ext.settings.dtd.dtdDoctypeElement:
Matches the DTD element tags:

* <!`ELEMENT` `BANNER` (#PCDATA)>

* <!`ATTLIST` TVSCHEDULE NAME CDATA #REQUIRED>

```html

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<!DOCTYPE TVSCHEDULE [
	<!ELEMENT BANNER (#PCDATA)>
	<!ELEMENT DAY (DATE,(HOLIDAY|PROGRAMSLOT+)+)>
	<!ATTLIST TVSCHEDULE NAME CDATA #REQUIRED>
]>


```
Leave it empty to disable for this item only
ext.settings.dtd.dtdDoctypeQualifier:
Matches the DTD qualifiers:

* <!ELEMENT DAY (`DATE`,(`HOLIDAY`|`PROGRAMSLOT`+)+)>

```html

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<!DOCTYPE TVSCHEDULE [
	<!ELEMENT BANNER (#PCDATA)>
	<!ELEMENT DAY (DATE,(HOLIDAY|PROGRAMSLOT+)+)>
	<!ATTLIST TVSCHEDULE NAME CDATA #REQUIRED>
]>


```
Leave it empty to disable for this item only
ext.settings.dtd.dtdDoctypeQuantifier:
Matches the DTD quantifiers:

* <!ELEMENT DAY (DATE,(HOLIDAY`|`PROGRAMSLOT`+`)`*`)>

* <!ELEMENT PROGRAMSLOT (TIME,TITLE,DESCRIPTION`?`)>

```html

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<!DOCTYPE TVSCHEDULE [
	<!ELEMENT BANNER (#PCDATA)>
	<!ELEMENT DAY (DATE,(HOLIDAY|PROGRAMSLOT+)*)>
	<!ELEMENT PROGRAMSLOT (TIME,TITLE,DESCRIPTION?)>
]>


```
Leave it empty to disable for this item only
